education.studyType: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

highlights: Used React and Next.js to build a full-stack website that connects teenagers with professional opportunities they're passionate about.
Used Python and Django to create a backend service that takes responses from a personality quiz and suggests careers that the quiz taker may like.
Scraped 13,000+ LinkedIn profiles using Python/Selenium to determine target audience and raise awareness about our company.
Organized and led a team of full-stack software developers.
Used Python with Discord.py and Pycord to develop chatbots for Discord according to varying customer requirements.
Learned to use third-party APIs (eg: Google Docs, Microsoft Office, Reddit API, etc.) and integrated them into a chat-based user interface.

projects.name: Drippr
projects.description: An iOS app for coffee enthusiasts to explore and create recipes for methods like V60, Chemex, and Aeropress. It offers a recipe browser, customizable recipes, and AR tutorials. With a dynamic step-by-step timer, it simplifies brewing for beginners. Designed with a native iOS feel for a seamless user experience.

projects.name: Blitz Board
projects.description: A real-time multiplayer typing game, inspired by my passion for typing. It brings competitive typists together for live typing tests, featuring performance tracking and leaderboards to foster a community of speed and accuracy enthusiasts.

projects.name: Sparta Bot
projects.description: A custom Discord bot for server management, offering auto-moderation, reaction roles, message sniping, and automated responses. It also includes music integration and fun commands to promote member engagement in communities.

awards.title: CBSE School Topper
awards.summary: Recognized for being the highest overall scorer, as well as highest scorer in Physics and Mathematics, in my school for Grade 12 CBSE Board examinations.
